text:
UK cases continue down, with 20-day growth -4½%/day.

Log-log plot shows us approaching the low of LD2.

Green trend still 4.27m in 2 weeks as the growth slows to match the daily extensions. LD1 pre-vaccine was similar - then rose.

#COVID19 #CovidUK #coronvirus #vaccine https://t.co/n6bxbhDDe4
